## Setup

```{r}
library("dplyr")
library("tidyr")
library("ggplot2")
```


```{r}
total_counts <- read.delim("../data/total-counts.txt", stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
str(total_counts)
```

## How many reads per lane?

```{r}
counts_per_lane <- total_counts %>%
  group_by(stage, lane) %>%
  summarize(counts = sum(counts))
head(counts_per_lane)
```

```{r}
ggplot(counts_per_lane, aes(x = stage, y = counts / 10^6, color = lane)) +
  geom_point()
```


```{r}
ggplot(total_counts, aes(x = stage, y = counts)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
